## iprint :
### 
### 
### 
### 
### 
### 
```
color variable
object : ct.
    ct.gray = '\033[90m'
    ct.red = '\033[91m'
    ct.green = '\033[92m'
    ct.yello = '\033[93m'
    ct.blue = '\033[94m'
    ct.magenta = '\033[95m'
    ct.sky = '\033[96m'
    ct.white = '\033[97m'
    -----------------------------------------------------------
    ct.grayk = '\033[100m'
    ct.redk = '\033[101m'
    ct.greenk = '\033[102m'
    ct.yellok = '\033[103m'
    ct.bluek = '\033[104m'
    ct.magentak = '\033[105m'
    ct.skyk = '\033[106m'
    ct.whitek = '\033[107m'
```
